ygData.subject: Re: Jewelery Roller coaster
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought that was Channeling skill?  Or is that merely your SPEED at casting? Fistle From:	Scott Murawski  on 06/10/99 07:18 AM PDT To:
ygData.messageBody:
I thought that was Channeling skill? Or is that merely your SPEED
at casting?

Fistle




From: Scott Murawski <scott@...> on 06/10/99 07:18 AM
PDT
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com@SMTP@Exchange
cc:
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Jewelery Roller coaster

From: Scott Murawski <scott@...>

>From: "Hapke, Matthew" <mahapke@...>
>
>WIS is mana for Clerics. Last night I wasn't eve trying and I sold
12
>pair of WIS rings, and 8pair of earings. I also sold two more
masks!
>Man, those clerics love their wisdom hehe
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Jason Cent [SMTP:jcent@...]

>>
>> So we know that CHA effects vending prices and spell resists
and
>> Charm duration....and that INT gives mana.......what does WIS
effect?
>>
>> Thanks.
>> Fistle

WIS is also for a last chance at success.
Is it WIS that helps you regain concentration when casting a spell
after
getting hit?

Azboklin the enchanter
